fluff: Thieves are highly skilled individuals who depend on the element of surprise to gain an advantage in any situation. With their agile movements and a clever disposition, they can slip past enemies or pickpocket valuable items with ease. The darkness is their friend, and they revel in the shadows, striking without warning when the opportunity arises.
title: Robber (N), Thug (C)

specialTalents.name: Backstab.
specialTalents.description: If you hit a creature who is unaware of your attack, you deal an extra weapon die of damage. Add additional weapon dice of damage equal to half your level (round down).

specialTalents.name: Thievery.
specialTalents.description:
You are adept at thieving skills and have the necessary tools of the trade secreted on your person (they take up no gear slots). You are trained in the following tasks and have advantage on any associated ability checks:
  • Climbing
  • Sneaking and hiding
  • Applying disguises
  • Finding and disabling traps
  • Delicate tasks such as picking pockets and opening locks

reward.name: Treasurehold.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Bandit King/Queen or Wraith, a thief may establish or build a Guild Tavern (for king/queen) or Thief Den (for wraith). When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.
